item.title: After teen suicide, OpenAI claims it is “helping people when they need it most”
item.description: ChatGPT allegedly provided suicide encouragement to teen after moderation safeguards failed.

item.title: With AI chatbots, Big Tech is moving fast and breaking people
item.description: Why AI chatbots validate grandiose fantasies about revolutionary discoveries that don’t exist.
